books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.description: Illustrates best practices and main pitfalls in software development.

books.title: Clean Code
books.description: Teaches a set of best practices to achieve greater readability and maintainability of your code.

books.title: Outwitting the Devil
books.description: An interview where Napoleon Hill forces the Devil to reveal tricks to escape traps like fear, procrastination, anger, indicated as tools of the devil to alienate humans.

books.title: The Kybalion
books.description: This mysterious book is an initiation into the wisdom of Hermeticism, a mystical tradition that has crossed time from Antiquity to the present day.

button.title: Some good memories
button.description: A time capsule project, created at a Rocketseat event, I intend to redo this project every year.

about.title: Who am I?
about.description: In addition to being a professional passionate about technology, I also have several hobbies, which include playing string instruments, reading books on various topics, watching series with my wife, and taking care of my two cats.

quote.sentence: The man who does more than he is paid for will soon be paid for more than he does.
quote.author: Napoleon Hill

projects.title: Lokos D' Bira Website
projects.description1: Web app created with friends as a tribute to a very charismatic band from my city
projects.description2: Highlight for the SEO optimizations made with NextJS, try searching for the band's name on Google

projects.title: Metallica API
projects.description1: Backend project developed to celebrate Rock Day (July 13)
projects.description2: The intention of this project is to network with other programmers

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description1: All programmers have this project, but I did almost everything using Tailwind
projects.description2: This project was done as a technical challenge for a Full-Stack position

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description1: I experimented with using a different ORM than I was used to, I used Sequelize instead of Prisma
projects.description2: This application was made as a technical challenge for a Full-Stack position

projects.title: Chat GPT Clone
projects.description1: Consumption of the OpenAI API, which is the same used by the official ChatGPT
projects.description2: The interface is the same as ChatGPT at its launch.

projects.title: Movie Library
projects.description1: Using the API provided by The Movie DataBase (TMDB)
projects.description2: You can see interesting data about your favorite movies

projects.title: NLW E-Sports
projects.description1: One of the first programming events I participated in
